tool.name: ReVerb Relation Extractor
tool.description: (standalone) Identify and extract binary relations from unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
Identifies and extracts binary relations from English text.
.. class:: infomark
Full Documentation at `http://reverb.cs.washington.edu <http://reverb.cs.washington.edu>`_.
**Required Annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document containing:
1. http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token #. http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Markable #. http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/GenericRelation
